21 class module;

23 template<typename T, typename Traits>
24 class class_;
25 
27 class context
28 {
29 public:
32  // and add default global methods (`require()`, `run()`)
33  explicit context(v8::Isolate* isolate = nullptr,
34  v8::ArrayBuffer::Allocator* allocator = nullptr,
35  bool add_default_global_methods = true);
36  ~context();
37 
39  v8::Isolate* isolate() { return isolate_; }
40 
42  std::string const& lib_path() const { return lib_path_; }
43 
45  void set_lib_path(std::string const& lib_path) { lib_path_ = lib_path; }
46 
50  v8::Local<v8::Value> run_file(std::string const& filename);
51 
53  v8::Local<v8::Value> run_script(std::string const& source,
54  std::string const& filename = "");
55 
57  context& set(char const* name, v8::Local<v8::Value> value);
58 
60  context& set(char const *name, module& m);
61 
63  template<typename T, typename Traits>
64  context& set(char const* name, class_<T, Traits>& cl)
65  {
66  v8::HandleScope scope(isolate_);
67  cl.class_function_template()->SetClassName(v8pp::to_v8(isolate_, name));
68  return set(name, cl.js_function_template()->GetFunction(isolate_->GetCurrentContext()).ToLocalChecked());
69  }
70 
71 private:
72  bool own_isolate_;
73  v8::Isolate* isolate_;
74  v8::Global<v8::Context> impl_;
75 
76  struct dynamic_module;
77  using dynamic_modules = std::map<std::string, dynamic_module>;
78 
79  static void load_module(v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const& args);
80  static void run_file(v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const& args);
81 
82  dynamic_modules modules_;
83  std::string lib_path_;
84 };
85 
86 } // namespace v8pp
